entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:58 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: SW 43 km/h gust 61 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening and ending late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
